channel.title: Need A Tut For Making it Say
channel.description: Ok so when u hit a door dummy hay eat food and attk players i need it to say over there heads "im massing" some 1 please help me w/ that?

item.title: Need A Tut For Making it Say
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

if (actionAmount > ##) { txt4 = "I'm massing!"; sendMessage("Kicked for acting too fast!"); misc.println("Client acts too fast - disconnecting it"); disconnected = true; }

that would be with txt4

the last one wouldn’t have worked because for one thing you needed to click 25 times in about half a second ? you’re supposed to lower the number untill you find the amount you wanted … also i had it using messageToAll instead of txt4 which is better anyways because if you’re on the other side of the map you can see if someone is massing …
